info.title: DK Eyewitness Top 10 Travel Guides San Francisco

chapter.title: San Francisco’s Highlights
chapter.para: San Franciscans will, rather candidly, admit that they are the most fortunate people on earth, the occasional earthquake notwithstanding; and most visitors, after a few days of taking in the sights and sounds of this magnificent city, will agree. Ask anyone who has been here and they will tell you it’s their favorite US city. The geographical setting evokes so much emotional drama, the light seems clearer, the colors more vivid, the cultural diversity of the ethnic neighborhoods so captivating and inviting, that it’s a place almost everyone can fall in love with at first sight.

All 10 are, in the editor’s opinion, of roughly equal merit. Floors are referred to throughout in accordance with American usage; ie. the “first floor” is at ground level.

section.title: Main Contributors
section.para: Native San Franciscan Jeffrey Kennedy now lives mainly in Italy and Spain. A graduate of Stanford University, he spends his time producing, writing and acting. He is also co-author of Top 10 Rome and author of Top 10 Mallorca and Top 10 Miami " The Keys.
Produced by Sargasso Media Ltd, London

section.title: Special Editions of DK Travel Guides
section.para: DK Travel Guides can be purchased in bulk quantities at discounted prices for use in promotions or as premiums. We are also able to offer special editions and personalized jackets, corporate imprints, and excerpts from all of our books, tailored specifically to meet your own needs. To find out more, please contact: (in the US) specialsales@dk.com (in the UK) travelspecialsales@uk.dk.com (in Canada) DK Special Sales at general@tourmaline.ca (in Australia) business.development@pearson.com.au
